alexa_info: Switch on if the device is to be found during Alexa's next device search.

already_rated: Vous avez déjà evalué cette application
app_delete_successful: L'application a été supprimée avec succès
app_description: Z-Wave is the international standard for wireless communication in the  Smart Home. This app implements a User Interface to access a Z-Wave  based Smart Home controlled by Z-Way.
app_failed_to_delete: Echec de la suppression de l'application.
app_failed_to_update: Echec de la mise à jour de l'application.
app_installation_successful: L'application a été installée avec succès.
app_installation_successful_but_restart_: L'application a été installée avec succès. Veuillez redémarrer votre Raspberry.
app_reset_successful_to_version: L'application a été réinitialisée avec succès
app_store_access_info: The App Store contains apps from different sources and on different maturity levels. On default you will only see mature and approved apps for download. Adding different Tokens may open you the access to apps not shared to the public yet and apps that are in alpha or beta state. The developers will usually give you can access token you can add to the list of tokens below
app_update_confirm: Après la mise à jour, une instance peut ne pas fonctionner. Dans ce cas, veuillez supprimer ce périphérique de la liste "Active" et procéder de nouveau à l'installation. Êtes-vous sûr de mettre à jour une application?
app_update_successful: L'application a été mise à jour avec succès
app_update_successful_but_restart_necess: L'application a été mise à jour avec succès. Veuillez redémarrer votre Raspberry.
are_you_sure_restore: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir écraser la configuration du réseau. Avez-vous créé une sauvegarde ? Notice: A completely reseted controller cannot be restored by this .zab-backup-file. Please use the backup / restore functionality from the ExpertUI under Network > Controller instead. Activate 'Also restore network topology information (please read the user manual first!)' during restore. (not recommended)
are_you_sure_restore_info: This function allows you to restore your Smart Home settings (my settings, rooms, users, apps, Z-Way network...) that were previously saved in a .zab backup file. The usual restore restores all Smart Home settings and compares the current state of the Z-Way network data with the stored ones and tries to heal failed nodes or incomplete interviews. The restored backup does NOT overwrite the existing Z-Way network configuration. If you want to restore a fully resetted controller or restore your Z-Way network to an older configuration, select the 'Restore Z-Way Network'check box.
assign_room_info: Assigns the room name to the call name. For example The device with the name thermostat in the room kitchen becomes a thermostat kitchen.
author: Author
backup_info: The backup saves all device names, icons, apps, settings, etc. Informations about Z-Wave nodes present in the network are determined automatically on boot up and can not be changed using a backup. Hence, after a Factory reset all information about the network are gone regardless of any backup. Restoring a Z-wave network with all its Node Ids and its topology from a backup file is possible but requires special caution and knowledge. A dedicated backup/restore function - available in the Z-Wave expert User Interface - is required for such an operation.
btn_update_device_database: Mise á jour de la base de données des dispositifs
btn_update_from_device: Mise à jour à partir du périphérique
bugreport_info: Ce formulaire est dédié pour rapporter des bugs dans l'interface utilisateur. Si vous avez besoin d'assistance, veuillez consulter les forums ou contactez le support par email.
call_name_info: A custom name used by the Alexa and Google Home module to identify the device. By default the device name will used.
camera_not_supported: No camera found or browser doesn't support. Please enter DSK manually or use our App wich is now available on Google Play (Android) and the App Store (iOS). Links below
cannot_delete_all_icons: Impossible de supprimer toutes les icônes
can_add_app: Vous pouvez ajouter une application dans cette séction
can_include_device: Vous pouvez inclure un dispositif dans cette séction
cloudbackup_info: Cloud backup is conveniently saving up to 3 backup files on our server (using SSL encryption). If you don’t like to see your backup file on our server, just deactivate this service. Download of backup files require admin privilege and a valid admin email address. The current Email address on file for the admin is __email__. To change this please refer to the user settings of 'admin'.
cloudbackup_install: Installer la sauvegarde dans le cloud
cloud_not_active: Sauvegarde dans le cloud inactive. Activer la dans Apps > Active > Cloud Backup. SVP

configuration_cancel: L'auto-configuration du dispositif(Interview Z-Wave ) non completé. Il est possible que toutes les fonctions ne seront pas disponibles. Vous devriez remettre à zéro le dispositif et reinitialisez le processus d'inclusion
confirm_exclusion: Confirmez maintenant l'exclusion du dispositif à supprimer. Vous devez consulter le manuel du dispositif pour plus d'informations sur la façon de confirmer son exclusion. Ce processus permettra également de réinitialiser le dispositif dans sa configuration d'usine.

following_elements_remove: The following elements will be removed
google_home_info: Switch it on if you want to use the device with Google Home.
heading_advanced_rule_then_further_setti: Trigger the rule check on activation of the following scenes:
help_advanced_rule: This option links all conditions in the list to a logical OR or AND. With OR, the action is executed if at least one condition applies. With AND, the action is only executed if all conditions apply.
help_advanced_rule_then_further_settings: By default the logical rule listens to all changes of devices listed in conditions. If a change is recognized by the logical rule it will check the condition wether to trigger an action or not. Deactivate this option if the logical rule condition should only be checked by triggered scenes. It is recommented to use this field in combination with Trigger the rule check on activation of the following scenes option.
help_advanced_rule_time_condition: This condition checks if the current time is less than or equal to or greater than or equal to the entered time. E.g. current time: 09:00 and condition: >= 10:00 will return false and not pass the rule. 24-h-format - hh:mm
help_delay: Delay between the appearance of the state and triggering of the event in seconds.
help_nested_condition: Add a new nested condition - like in logical notation: A AND B AND (C OR D). The additional nested condition is (C OR D). An action is only triggered if the conditions A and B and either the condition C or D are met together. Example: If outside the light sensor A > 80% and the temperature sensor B > 26°C and (time < 12:00 am or time > 02:00 pm) then the jalousie in the living room is set to 50%.
help_reset_time: After manual intervention, the heating control returns to the defined schedule after a specified time (in hours).
help_security_delay_before_alarm: Delayed alarm duration, between 1 and 1800 seconds.
help_security_immediate_activate_schedul: Start the time schedule as soon as the application is activated.
help_sensor_discrete: The action is described with a two-digit value: The first digit is the button number, the second digit points to the action of this button (0=short press, 1=release, 2=hold, 3=short press two times, 4 = short press three times, and so on. Examples: Double Click button 2 => 23, Single Click button 1 = 10)
